properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS LIKE '%' || ? ||'%' ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
